title: Means of being rescued
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Boats and boating - Safety measures
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Accidents - Prevention
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Rescue work
description: Episode of Series "Safer Boating with Ken Warby". Outlines the importance of storing safety equipment on small craft, of being prepared for an emergency, and the correct distress procedures. Cast includes Tony Barry, Patrick Bollen, Bob Mercer. Credits: Producer, Peter Johnson; director, script, Rob McAuley; photographer, Peter Hopwood; editor, Max Lemon; sound, Harry Haws; commentator, Ken Warby.
